#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod=1e9+7;

#define fileinput freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fileoutput freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define T ll t ; cin>>t ; while(t--)
#define fastio ios::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0)

int main()
{
    ll n,k;
    cin>>n>>k;

    ll a;
    vector<ll> v;

    for(ll i=0;i<n;i++) {
        cin>>a;

        if(a<=k) {
            v.push_back(a);
        }
    }

    sort(v.begin(),v.end());

    for(ll i=0;i<v.size();i++) {
        bool found=binary_search(v.begin()+i+1,v.end(),k-v[i]);

        if(found) {
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
            return 0;
        }
    }

    cout<<"No"<<endl;

    return 0;
}
